data.title: 准备以至少 30 秒的时间回答以下问题
data.subject: Describe an important group or organization in your country.
data.answer:
The important organization that I am going to talk about is United Nations. It is an international organization founded in 1945. Currently made up of 193 Member States, the UN and its work are guided by the purposes and principles contained in its founding Charter. 
The UN has evolved over the years to keep pace with a rapidly changing world. It is their main activity. Their goal is to provide a place where the world's nations can gather together, discuss common problems and find shared solutions. Personally, I would like to support their goals because I love peace.
